Keywords: Animal , Asgardian , Deity
Real Name: Thor Odinson/Toothgnasher/Toothgrinder
Special Powers
A CHARIOT OF THE GODS: Thor's Mighty Chariot has Cosmic Energy team ability. // Sidestep. // Adjacent friendly characters with a shard keyword can use Defend, but only to replace Thor's Mighty Chariot's defense.
MAKE WAY FOR THOR!: Charge. When Thor's Mighty Chariot uses it, after resolutions knockback all opposing characters he moved through.
LET THE STORM STRIKE!: Energy Explosion, [3 bolts]. // When Thor's Mighty Chariot makes a range attack, modify attack +1 for each action token on his targets and after resolutions give an action token to all missed targets.
LET THE DOOR OF REALMS SWING WIDE!: MOVE: Improved Movement: Characters. Move in a direct path. After resolutions, make a close attack targeting all opposing characters moved through, regardless of adjacency. Hit characters are dealt this character's printed damage instead of normal damage.
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
TARGETING: Adjacent
Linked Units
